1 select a default item and copy the hex

2 then paste into cheat engine make sure the value type is set to array of byte 

3 select one value then hit ctrl + a then hit the arrow to bring them done

4 now go back here and select a shirt you want to swap it with then select the hex and copy it

5 now in cheat engine select a value again at the bottom hit ctrl+a

6 now double click into the value you selected and then paste the new hex and click enter or ok

7 now you should have the shirt you desire (you may need to join another room for it to load)




default v shirt = 38 00 61 00 61 00 37 00 39 00 35 00 36 00 33 00 2D 00 61 00 63 00 65 00 31 00 2D 00 34 00 62 00 61 00 37 00 2D 00 61 00 64 00 30 00 63 00 2D 00 66 00 33 00 32 00 31 00 30 00 61 00 37 00 38 00 31 00 34 00 32 00 66 00
